019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
022
023/**
024 * A {@link QmpCommand} that send a system_powerdown to the VM.
025 */
026public class QmpPowerdown extends QmpCommand {
027
028    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
029        "PMD.VariableNamingConventions" })
030    private static final JsonNode jsonTemplate
031        = parseJson("{ \"execute\": \"system_powerdown\" }");
032
033    @Override
034    public JsonNode toJson() {
035        return jsonTemplate.deepCopy();
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public String toString() {
040        return "QmpPowerdown()";
041    }
042
043}
